attributes.action: INVESTIGATE ON MY HARASSMENT IN LONDON!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'm targeted by the electromagnetic, microwave and direct energy weapons. Please will the British government take steps to investigate the torturing of victims on their daily basic lives by the electromagnetic, microwave and direct energy weapons. We need to stop E/M harassment. We want to stop microwave weapons. We want to stop direct energy weapons. A signal detector would get rid of all the perpetrators activities. The army have them to protect themselves but domestic citizens have nothing to protect themselves with.
M Tahani
